name: Desert Eagle Simulator
description:
Control this huge Desert Eagle as he takes flight across this massive open world desert. Battle against Warthogs, Lion, Rabbits, Scorpions, and Cheetah. Help him grow from a weak bird into a strong Desert Eagle. Hunt down your natural enemies and survive the night.
Top App Features:
**Survive and Thrive in this huge 3D Desert Landscape
**9 Different African Desert Animals included
**Dynamic times of day plus weather changes
**Upgrade your eagle Speed, Strength, and Stamina
**12 Challenging Simulator Adventures to Complete
**6 Special Battle Scenarios in Survival Mode
**Bird Simulation at its best
FANTASTIC 3D GAMEPLAY
Easy to understand gameplay, with epic 3D graphics and open world style.
EVER CHANGING CONDITIONS
No two games will ever be the same. Each time you play it will be a very unique experience.
UPGRADE YOUR HUNTING EAGLE
Spend your meat points to increase your Strength, Stamina, and Speed
SPECIAL BATTLE SIMULATIONS
Try to Survive these challenging battles. Wrestle with other eagles.
9 ANIMALS INCLUDED
Cheetah, Snake, Scorpion, Warthog and more . . .
Like us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames
Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com. Try our Lion, Wolf, Snake Simulator, Bear Simulator, and Gorilla Sim. We are working toward a multiplayer version.
